reporter_caption.center: ATLANTIC COAST LINE R. CO., v. ADAMS, 261 Ala. 696 (1954)

caption.center: ATLANTIC COAST LINE R. CO. v. Annie ADAMS.

opinion.attorneys:
Huey, Stone Patton, Bessemer, for petitioner.
Ling Bains, Bessemer, opposed.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of Atlantic Coast Line Railroad Company for certiorari to the Court of Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision of that court in Atlantic Coast Line R. Co. v. Adams, 37 Ala. App. 538, 74 So.2d 524.
Writ denied.
LIVINGSTON, SIMPSON and GOODWYN, JJ., concur.
